plot outline: A haunting spirit of an unknown girl who dwells in a karaoke booth, named "Premika" after the clothing tag she wears. One night, someone accidentally switched on a karaoke booth that Premika possesses in. Then, she was awakened from the death, and is ready to torment whoever that sings incorrectly or out of tune, bringing together a horrifying, laughing, amusing and tuneful haunt.
title: Premika
plot: People who can't sing get haunted by a ghost called _Premika_ (qv) that lives in a karaoke booth.

A haunting spirit of an unknown girl who dwells in a karaoke booth, named "_Premika_ (qv)" after the clothing tag she wears. One night, someone accidentally switched on a karaoke booth that _Premika_ (qv) possesses in. Then, she was awakened from the death, and is ready to torment whoever that sings incorrectly or out of tune, bringing together a horrifying, laughing, amusing and tuneful haunt.::M Pictures
